column1: FUNERAL NOTICE: The funeral for Elaine Morrow will be Tuesday June 16
column2: 2015 at 10:15 AM from FLYNN & DAGNOLI-MONTAGNA HOME FOR FUNERALS WEST CHAPELS
column3: 521 West Main St. North Adams followed by a Funeral Mass at 11:00 AM at St. Elizabeth of Hungary Church. Burial will follow in Southview cemetery. Calling hours at the funeral home are Monday from 4-7 PM.
